column3: several changes were made to the infrastructure. Firstly
column4: Multi-AZ deployment was re-enabled for RDS to ensure high availability and fault tolerance. Additionally
column5: RDS Proxy was added to improve scalability and manageability of database connections
column6: ensuring all requests are efficiently handled. Secondly
column7: the size of the database was increased to accommodate the growing demand
column8: and Performance Insights was enabled for 12 months to gain valuable performance metrics and leverage AWS Support benefits for the first year to ensure smooth operation and timely assistance in case of any issues. These adjustments collectively enhance the reliability
